participant_1.background:
I've learned how to manage my time better and prioritize my tasks.
i love to dance.
My hair is a deep blood red, the same color as the blood of my enemies.
I try to stay in touch with my family as often as I can.
i clean houses for extra money.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to a book club meeting to discuss our favorite American novels.
i work for a large law firm.
I remember listening to the radio with my father and singing along to the songs.
I am trying to find a new job that will be a better fit for my personality.
i own a dog that is small.

content.text: My day is going well. I am about to head to a book club meeting.
That sounds fun! What are you reading?
I am reading The Great Gatsby. I am really enjoying it.
That's one of my favorite books! I love the setting and the characters.
Me too! I am also trying to find a new job.
Oh no! Why are you looking for a new job?
I am not happy with my current job. I am a lawyer and I do not like the work environment.
That's too bad. I hope you find a new job that you are happy with.
Thanks! I am trying to find something in the non-profit sector.
That sounds like a great fit for you! I am sure you will find something soon.
I hope so! I am tired of being unhappy with my job.
I know the feeling. I am glad that you are taking steps to make a change.
Me too! I am excited to start a new chapter in my life.
